column4: hey guys i need to add some files to the /opt folder. I need some help in doing so. Could you tell me how can i add files to the /opt folder . It says that i need to be root to do so.
see i downloaded xammp and i have to place it in the /opt folder.
but it says that i need to be root. I am using the admin account but its not working
call the command with sudo <insert your command here>
